thread.title: Twitter quarterly loss widens to $167m - BBC News
thread.title_full: Twitter quarterly loss widens to $167m - BBC News

title: Twitter quarterly loss widens to $167m - BBC News
text:
Twitter quarterly loss widens to $167m 9 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright Getty Images Shares in Twitter are set to fall when Wall Street opens after it reported that its fourth-quarter losses had nearly doubled. 
The social networking service reported a loss of $167m (Â£133m) in the final three months of 2016, as against $90m in the same period a year earlier. 
Active user numbers were slightly down at 319 million, compared with 320 million a year earlier. 
Fourth-quarter revenues were $717m, up on last year's $710m.
